info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued June 2 at 8:31PM CDT until June 2 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland KS
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Red Willow County in southwestern Nebraska... Eastern Hitchcock County in southwestern Nebraska...
* Until 915 PM CDT.
* At 830 PM CDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 5 miles south of Palisade to 9 miles south of Culbertson to 6 miles east of Herndon, moving north at 55 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Trained weather spotters south of Stratton report 1/4 mile visibility in blowing dust
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
US 24 between Bartley and Trenton.
Locations impacted include... McCook, Trenton, Culbertson, Indianola, Palisade, Bartley, and Danbury.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Strong to severe thunderstorms are also possible behind this wall of dust. Keep updated with this quickly evolving situation.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 9:15 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 9:15 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 9:15 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 9:15 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
